fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Build a trap at night. You may have an infinite number of traps at once.
- Spend one trap to set up a trap at a player's house. You also choose what that trap specializes in.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your options are, for specializations: Killing, Protective, Investigative, Other.
- Specialized traps will kill people trying to use abilities from that category on your target. Other refers to any other type of ability.
